channel.title: CO-OP (Large Flash)
channel.description: From the creators of The 1UP Show, CO-OP continues the tradition. No review scores. No talking heads. It's a show simply inspired by the conversations real gamers are having every day with their peers. RESPECT THE GAME.
channel.itunes:summary: RESPECT THE GAME. Produced, written, and directed by Area 5 (named after the final stage of the game Rez), a company formed from the staff formerly responsible for The 1UP Show, CO-OP is lovingly crafted each week to bring the best-of-gaming's-best to their fans. The CO-OP team is made up of: Cesar Quintero, Matt Chandronait, Jay "JayFresh" Frechette, Ryan O'Donnell, Jason Bertrand and Rob Bowen. You won't find any review scores or talking heads, here. Inspired by the conversations gamers around the world have every day with their peers, these are real gamers that engage in a dialogue their fans can relate to. Not limited to a standard cast, CO-OP brings in industry insiders and gaming media's most popular players to share in the critique, love, and bashing of this latest and greatest medium to grace humankind. CO-OP's game coverage is rounded out by narrative bits that often poke fun at and sometimes humiliate the show's creators and friends. A grain of truth, an ounce of hogwash, a ton of fun!
channel.itunes:subtitle: RESPECT THE GAME. Produced, written, and directed by Area 5 (named after the final stage of the game Rez), a company formed from the staff formerly responsible for The 1UP Show, CO-OP is lovingly crafted each week to bring the best-of-gaming's-best to
channel.itunes:author: Revision3
channel.itunes:keywords: cesar quintero, co-op, coop, jason bertrand, jay frechette, jayfresh, matt chandronait, nintendo, playstation, ps3, rob bowen, ryan o'donnell, video games, wii, xbox, xbox360

item.title: Gamer Cribs: Cesar Quintero--Wii Sports Resort, Overlord 2, Real Racing - CO-OP
item.description: Check it out! We introduce a brand new series! GAMER CRIBS! First up, that mega-hottie, CESAR QUINTERO. AWW YEAH! Also: Wii Sports Resort (is awesome), Overlord 2, and Real Racing for the iPhone.

item.title: The Only Way to Fly--Prototype, Infamous, Red Faction: Guerrilla - CO-OP
item.description: It's a theme show! Three open-world games released so close to one another, how could we not? Prototype, Infamous, and Red Faction fight it out in a cage match of awesome!

item.title: How Jason Got His Groove Back - CO-OP
item.description: Love is a 200-player, persistent world in which players have complete control over the very landscape. Follow that by Motorstorm: Pacific Rift and Henry Hatsworth and we've truly run the gamut of gaming.
item.content:encoded: Love is a 200-player, persistent world in which players have complete control over the very landscape. Follow that by Motorstorm: Pacific Rift and Henry Hatsworth and we've truly run the gamut of gaming.
